title: Material Culture and other Things - Post-disciplinary Studies in
description:
Fahlander, F. & Oestigaard, T.  (eds) 2004. Material Culture and other Things - Post-disciplinary Studies in the 21st century, Gotarc series C no 61, Gothenburg: Inst. (ISBN 91-85245-12-7)


Material Culture and Other Things aims to broaden up the fields of inquiries in archaeology through a post-disciplinary approach to the study of material culture and other things. The contributors in this book lay emphasis on different types of materiality in the constitution of social life, which offer new perspectives to both the present and the past, and hence, exploring what "archaeology" can be.

- Material Culture and Post-Disciplinary Sciences,  pp1-19

- Material Culture Studies and Archaeology, pp20-56

- Culture and Ethnicity in Mayanist Discourse, pp109-160
Johan Normark
 
Operational Ethnicity
- Serial Practice and Materiality, pp161-184
